```intros. apply ordered_cover_sind.
- intros. apply cover_ordered_cover in H0. destruct H0 as [l2 [Hperm Horder]].
  apply subst_pred_id.
- intros. apply cover_ordered_cover in H1. destruct H1 as [l3 [Hperm' Horder']].
  apply subst_pred_node with (l1 := l) (l2 := l2) (l3 := l0) (l4 := l3); auto.```

original: intros. apply ordered_cover_sind. - intros. apply cover_ordered_cover in H0. destruct H0 as [l2 [Hperm Horder]]. apply subst_pred_id. - intros. apply cover_ordered_cover in H1. destruct H1 as [l3 [Hperm' Horder']]. apply subst_pred_node with (l1 := l) (l2 := l2) (l3 := l0) (l4 := l3); auto.
